word: Guard your thoughts. In these closing days of earth's history Satan is working with desperate effort to seduce souls into sin. Keep your tongue as with a bridle. Keep your thoughts upon the Word of the living God. The same spirit that prompted rebellion in heaven is at work in our churches. . . . We are living in the last days of this earth's history, and Satan is making determined efforts to subvert the mind.--Letter 66, April 10, 1909, "To Those Assembled at Camp Meeting."
